84787.「すばらしい！ \n これでスタンプが貯まったカードが\n <%dM_CardN:
Wonderfully done! That makes
<%dM_CardNum> card(s) with all stamps earned.
<bw_break>

84788.「よし。これで スタンプが貯まったカードが \n <%dM_CardNum>枚:
You've filled out the stamps on <%dM_CardNum> of your cards, I see.
Very well! Your reward, as promised!

84793.「定められたクエストを こなしてきたようだな。 \n よし スタンプを押そう。\:
You've been busy completing more of your
quests, I see. Very well! Allow me to stamp
your card!
<end>

86460.「むむっ。オーグリード大陸のカードに \n スタンプが すべて 押されたようじゃ:
You've earned all stamps on your Ogreed card! Well done!
Ah, Ogreed... I wonder how Magnus is doing. He serves at Gartlant Castle, you know.
He's actually a distant relative of my wife. In his youth, he studied politics here under Lady Lushenda.

86461.「むむっ。ウェナ諸島のカードに \n スタンプが すべて 押されたようじゃ！\n:
You've earned all stamps on your Wena Islands card! Well done!
Ah, the Wena Islands... I wonder if Meru is in good health these days?
When he was still an armamentalist, he visited this country on one of his missions. It was a great opportunity to see his sword skills.

86462.「むむっ。エルトナ大陸のカードに \n スタンプが すべて 押されたようじゃ！\:
You've earned all stamps on your Eltona card! Well done!
Ah, Eltona... Has Dr. Hanetsuki's research borne any fruit, I wonder?
Well, I've never met him personally, but...I have read one of his research papers. It was truly outstanding work!

86463.「むむっ。ドワチャッカ大陸のカードに \n スタンプが すべて 押されたようじゃ:
You've earned all stamps on your Dwachakka card! Well done!
Ah, Dwachakka... The transportation mechanisms they use would be quite beneficial if we were to adopt them.
Both the castle and the town are much too large to get around... It is quite difficult at my age.

86464.「むむっ。プクランド大陸のカードに \n スタンプが すべて 押されたようじゃ！:
You've earned all stamps on your Pukuland card! Well done!
Ah, Pukuland... I hear there's a magnificent tower there called the Wondrous Windmill Tower.
I've always wanted to visit there with my family, but I'm afraid that may no longer be possible...

86465.「むむっ。レンダーシアのカードに \n スタンプが すべて 押されたようじゃ！\:
You've earned all stamps on your Lendersia card! Well done!
I have heard the news of your deeds throughout this land.
I would like to give my utmost thanks on behalf of all who live here. Thank you so much, !

86466.「おお なんと！ レンダーシアⅡのカードに \n スタンプが すべて 押されたよ:
My word! You've earned all stamps on your Lendersia Ⅱ card! Well done!
I would be remiss not to recognize all the great things you have done to help keep the peace!
We cannot afford to lose this battle... To keep Lendersia on the right path, I humbly ask for your continued cooperation!

86467.「おおっ レンダーシアⅢのカードに\n スタンプが すべて 押されたようではない:
My word! You've earned all stamps on your Lendersia Ⅲ card! Well done!
Wonderful! Simply wonderful! Perhaps I should call you the Savior of Lendersia from now on!
I knew it was no mistake to entrust you with that stamp card. You have my utmost respect!

86468.アリオス王は レンダーシアカードに\nスタンプを ひとつ 押した！\n<end>:
King Arios stamps a single stamp on the
Lendersia Card!
<end>

87618.「……ふむ。どうやら 新たに \n こなしてきたクエストは ないようだな。\n:
..... Apparently, there are no new quests to
complete. I couldn't get the stamp...<bw_break>
